name: Mandolin0
tagline: A web form bruteforce tool based on templating
body:
### Introduction
Mandolin0 is a web form bruteforce tool created with the aims to be very performant and easy to use. It is based on the concept of Template and Oracle, in order to be very easy to use even for not experienced auditors (this of course isn't an excuse to not learn how the things work). 

It was built in order to be **highly efficient**, **portable across different OS** and **easy to use**. 

Mandolin0 was built to be compatible with the mono framework, this in order to be executed even on Mac OS and Linux systems.

### Download
You can download a compiled version of Mandolin0 from [here](https://github.com/enkomio/Mandolin0/releases/tag/v1.0.0).

### Usage
Mandolin0 include Templates for the most common CMS. If you want to test a Wordpress web site just use the following command:

```
Mandolin0 -w http://wordpress.web.site --template Wordpress
```

### Documentation
* [user's manual](https://github.com/enkomio/Mandolin0/wiki)
